“aa” sanyuktha swaradeshaya:samaja + ika s + a + ma +j + a + i + ka (gathrakshara ha swara wen wima)s + a + ma +j + i + ka (nama prathyantha “a” swaraya lop wima)s + a + ma + ji + ka (“j” gathraksharaya ha “i” swaraya sandhi wima)s + aa + majika (nama prathyaye mula athi “a” sarala swaraya wenuwata “aa” sanyuktha swaraya aadesha wima)samajika (“s” gathraksharaya ha “aa” sanyuktha swaraya sandhi wima)lanka + ika = lankika, kaya + ika = kayika, pramana + ika = pramanika, darshana + ika = darshanika, sharira + ika = sharirika, anga + ika = aangika, mandala + ika = mandalika, parisara + ika = parisarika, amla + ika = aamlika, dharma + ika = dharmika aa pada “aa” sanyuktha swaradeshayata nidarshana ya.
